website_summaries.verdict: The Big Barker is an investment, but few competitors offer multiple layers of cushioning for maximum therapeutic support. We appreciate its easy maintenance and overall mattress size for larger breeds.
pros: Uses 7 inches of high quality therapeutic foam, in three supportive layers
Soft microfleece cover can be washed numerous times
Accommodates larger breeds and older pets with mobility issues
cons: Definitely on the higher end of the retail price spectrum
Not available in pet stores, only direct sales
Additional liner bag may be needed to protect cushion from moisture

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This is an expensive dog bed, but completely worth it. It delivered fast as well. I pulled it out of the box, rolled it out, and was impressed by how thick and large the bed looks, the picture really doesn't do it justice. I even laid on it, it's almost as comfortable as my actual bed. My 150 pound English Mastiff looked at me like I was the meanest person in the world when I moved his old bed out of the way. After a few hours, he finally laid down on it and immediately started snoring. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Bailey

customer_reviews.title: My Dog Loves his Big Barker bed!
customer_reviews.text: My 88lb Chocolate Labradoodle took one look at his Big Barker bed and settled right down on it. He had surgery to remove a cyst earlier in the day and it's great to see him sleeping comfortably. I'm so glad I found your company. There was no smell at all, and the bed is clearly well-made, Glad it is made in America! Wouldn't have bought it otherwise. HOWEVER - no liner comes with the bed and now I have to spend another $69 to buy a waterproof liner. The cover that comes with it is NOT waterproof, which it should be, and I know the bed will soon be stinky if I don't spend even more money on it.
customer_reviews.author: SavoyDancer

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY!
customer_reviews.text: I was asked what I liked MOST about this bed. Made in the USA, 10 year warranty, quality made, thickness, easy to clean - I just can't PICK ONE! It took just under 2 hours to fully "inflate". No odors. Both dogs took right to it. I even sat on it for a while. No "sinking" down to the floor. Popped right back up. Purchased the XL for my GSD/Rot/Lab mix KNOWING that the Beagle would be using it too. They seems to really like it. No more getting up every 1/2-hour or so and turning around trying to get comfortable. Snoring from BOTH dogs didn't take long. Customer Service was friendly, fast and responsive. I would HIGHLY recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: A bed to assist my large dog with severe joint challenges and pain.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Big Barker and it is perfect. My first one is very large and works extremely well but is larger than expected and a challenge to place in the house and large even for my very large dog. Plan to trade my first one or sell it and buy another Big Barker in the Large size. The Extra Large is much to big for my 80+ pound Regal Standard although the recommendation for his size was the extra large.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Love your Babies while you have them
customer_reviews.text: Aspen just turned 10 yrs old yesterday. She is in the early stage of spinal degeneration -- her hips are starting to lose strength. So, to ensure she has the best quality of life I bought for her (among other equipment) this Big Barker bed for the back of her "Aspenbus" so she can take naps as we drive around running errands and while I work in the garage. OMG!!!!!!! Money well spent! excellent quality! Aspen loves it! If you are thinking about buying this -- think no more -- just do it!! You won't be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Springs

customer_reviews.title: Best dog bed I’ve found!
customer_reviews.text: After checking several Wal Marts, a Petco and a Petsmart and then on line, I finally found Big Barker dog beds. It had everything I was looking for: quality mattress that wouldn’t bottom out, washable cover, made in the USA and a decent warranty. Our rough coated Collie puppy loves it as do several of our cats! After a potty training accident we got to verify that the cover is water resistant and easily removable for washing. We also purchased and installed the water proof liner. Strongly recommend this bed for your dog!
customer_reviews.author: Rick Galloway

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves his new Mattress
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several dog beds from pet stores for my German Shepherd and paid half the price but they did not last very long. Definitely worth spending the extra money for a top quality bed for your family pet & made in the USA. My dog loves this bed and it fully supports his big bones. The larger dogs need a slightly larger one. I received the wrong bed first time and it was larger. Unable to figure out how to get a refund for the difference I returned it and bought the slightly smaller one. The first size was much better. The quality of this bed is amazing and comes with a 10 year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Mowery

customer_reviews.title: I like it but my pup does not
customer_reviews.text: I feel this is a high quality bed for my 80+# Catahoula pup. However, she does not realize how high quality it is. She has laid on it but she does not prefer it as her night-time bed. She prefers the beds she has grown up with and has become accustomed to. I may be trying to spoil her a bit with this higher-end bed but she is not a fan. This is a great product and I'm disappointed that she does not like it. Probably better suited for a pup that weighs more, not sure. I personally give the product a rating of an 11 out of 10. Is there a possibility of a return/credit?

customer_reviews.title: so comfy and big enough for two!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bed when we got a puppy. Our old dog bed was still okay, but I thought each dog would like their own bed. Turns out they both prefer the new one, and after laying on it, I can tell why. It offers great support and yet is also soft. The Big Barker orthopedic bed also appears to be very well made, and I believe will stand up to years of puppy use. My only complaint, and it's easily overcome, is that the suede material cover really attracts dog hair. I simply added a blanket over the top and tucked in the sides. These are a pair of happy dogs! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: bookfan

customer_reviews.title: BIG BALONEY! for Arctic breeds with heavy coats!!
customer_reviews.text: Got the large according to the size listing info and my Samoyeds barely fit. Cover gets dirty fast. Interesting with pure white dogs and the little they use it. This is the “My Pillow” of the dog world. Guess Sammys are tougher than other dogs as they PREFER the floor. One is 10 and the other is 3 years old. A lot of money for very little interest from my dogs. Use your head and not your heart when looking here at least with tough arctic breeds.

customer_reviews.text: We have one large dog and two medium dogs who ALL easily fit on the bed we chose and it gives them excellent support. These beds are very well made and hold up to constant use. The combined weight of the dogs on the beds we purchased is about 135 pounds with NO sagging. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: rainbeaux

customer_reviews.title: Love this bed!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Big Barker dog bed. We wanted our dog to be comfortable in different parts of the house, so a second bed was purchased. The cover is easy to get on & off and launders great. Make your dog happy and save some money long term and buy a Barker.

customer_reviews.title: These beds are great!!!

When my puppy had to have surgery and I brought her home, I put two together and slept with her for about a week. I was very comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: This is the best quality dog bed ever made!

customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.author: Miks

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend the Big Barker Dog Bed
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend the Big Barker Dog Bed. This is the second one I have purchased for our Great Dane. customer_reviews.author: Marcie

customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my 3 year old female English mastiff. She absolutely loves it. So far, she has not attempted to test out the bed, but I know, with time, she’ll love it too.
customer_reviews.author: Caterina

This is a must for older doggies.

customer_reviews.text: My lab just had a knee surgery. The bed is so comfortable for her that she sits or lies on it 24/7 in complete ease. She is not allowed to move her left leg since her stitches are still healing. The bed is very firm and even for my grandson who likes to lie on it with Kona , it's very comfortable. The bed covers are easy to remove and launder. It dries in no time at all. I'm very happy that Kona is comfortable on it. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: kazumi

customer_reviews.title: x-large is perfect. Great orthopedic bed
customer_reviews.text: These were my third set of orthopedic dog beds I have ordered for my 65 pound plus dogs in 6 weeks. When they go to doggie day care and play hard, they are stiff when getting up. Initial dog bed too hard, next brand too soft and these just right. I ordered extra large which is very roomy for my dogs. The hound curls up so probably could have used a large but since dogs change beds .... x-large is perfect. Great orthopedic bed! customer_reviews.author: Candice Trummell

customer_reviews.title: Support for big dogs
customer_reviews.text: My large Akita took right to this new bed. She is not a fan of fluffy, fleecy or super squishy beds as it’s hard for her to get up out of them. The Big Barker takes care of all those issues: it has a soft, smooth finish to the fabric (love the chocolate color), unbelievable support and is easy to clean. Worth every penny for my girl!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie B.

customer_reviews.title: Simply the Best Dog Bed
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best dog bed. This is the second one I've purchased to replace a cheapy (heh, if you call $60 cheap) one I had in another room of the house. He was having trouble getting up from that bed that was only about 6mos old and had already become lumpy. My 9 year-old lab sleeps well on these and doesn't show any signs of pain or stiffness upon getting up. Yes, they are more expensive than other beds you'll find. But you won't have to replace these like other beds and that you feel good about your pet's physical well-being.

customer_reviews.title: sweet, 8yr old girl Quinn

She was recently diagnosed with the onset of hip displacia so I wanted to get the best customer reviewed orthopedic pet bed for my girl. She loves It! She had a broken leg when she was 6mo old so... She's not normal. She won't even bark. At anything. Won't even Speak 4 a favorite treat. She doesn't nest... or anything like that. She's just Quinn. My big girl. That I love dearly. The picture is of her sound asleep the first night she got her bed. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Big Comfort for those Big Buddies
customer_reviews.text: Just unpacked this bed and our buddies love it. We have a full grown Akita, Lab and German Shepherd pup. All of them have been on the bed. The Lab is currently sacking out for a late afternoon nap. Tried it out myself. Want to get one for the bed of my truck and camper shell. Super comfortable. We paid $385 for an extra-large bed from a competitor that barely lasted 4 years before the cover split from wear. This bed looks like it will last much longer. An excellent product, especially for large size buddies.

customer_reviews.author: Eric Murdoch

customer_reviews.title: Don’t know how I lived without this!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have! I can’t believe the money I spent on pet beds over and over for beds that break down and flattened after just a few months. I have two of these one for living room and one for bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bed for big dogs!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is awesome! Our 11-year old, 105-lb Golden Retriever with sore hips took a little while to warm up to it. When he sleeps on it, he is obviously very comfortable. Our little dog lays on it sometimes and he digs on the cover like crazy before laying down. No tears or damage!
customer_reviews.author: K. Uhl

customer_reviews.title: XL Beds Perfect for My Two Newfie Mixes
customer_reviews.text: I bought two extra larges. The picture of the bed with the headrest is the same brand and size from a separate purchase. I was only marginally optimistic that they would even use them because they both have big, fluffy, expensive sofa style beds and seldom venture into them - largely I believe because they are difficult for them to settle into and climb out of. These beds are perfect as they can climb right on and then have tons of room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: WhatWouldAtticusDo

customer_reviews.title: Comfy.

customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Your dog will thank you for this bed!

customer_reviews.title: Please let me say again, just how much I love these beds!
customer_reviews.text: I had previously purchased a Big Barker bed and upon the arrival of our new puppy, she immediately took over the bed -- leaving my other dog "bedless." Needless to say i ordered another bed. Now I have a bed upstairs and down, however I already need another as this is the preferred sleeping spot for both the dogs, whether they are upstairs or down. My dogs love these beds!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shopping in STL

customer_reviews.title: This Dog Bed Is Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: I bought this dog bed for my 8 year old springer spaniel mix when he was recovering from ACL surgery. We've bought him so many dog beds over the years and he always preferred the floor to any of them. I knew a hard floor would not be good while he was recovering, though, so I splurged on this bed in the hopes that he would like it. It's been over a year now and he still sleeps on it every night. I'm so glad he finally has a bed he loves and one that provides him comfort. This company and their bed are amazing. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: malmo

customer_reviews.title: Built to last
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I think this is the best dog bed since sliced bread. The best thing is it's Built in the USA!, even the foam is made here. Although we just received it I feel it will definitely out last the 10 year warranty. Unfortunately we just can't get the dog to try it. She is a 10 year old greyhound and very opinionated, but we hid her old bed and hoping she'll get to love it. Anyway I think its great if that matters, hoping it will do her old bones good.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sass

customer_reviews.title: Big bed!
customer_reviews.text: At first my 75 lb 11yr old lab pit mix wanted nothing to do with this new bed... over time (like 2 weeks) she started laying in.... now she’s always in it and stretches out completely! I really wish I got the one with the headrest, but I put a small pillow that works ok, when it stays on the bed! Very expensive bed so if I could afford to do it again, get the headrest! But Sophie is very happy with this bed, so that makes me super happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not cool foam, over heating problems
customer_reviews.text: Both my 100lb dog and 80lb dog sleep on this big bed. Not to happy as the zipper was able to be pulled down and they destroyed the corner foam. Also this is not a cool foam and the dogs over heat and lay on the floor for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Alaina J. =^_^=

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Bed for Aging Dog
customer_reviews.text: Our thirteen-year old girl, Paris, loves this bed and so do we! It's taken her a couple of days to get used to it but she's enjoying it more and more. We love it too - very nice quality and love the fact it's made in the USA with USA sourced materials. Paris is attached to her blanket, but the bed looks very nice without it.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: The Real Deal.  I am sick of Chinese junk.  This bed is very well made (Family operation in USA)
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bed for my 80 pound 7 year old lab. The foam is dense and holds its shape very well. The bed will hold a human just as well as a large dog. Best supportive, quality bed that I have found so far. I also like some of the Orvis beds for my other 50 pound 7 year old lab. This bed is great for dogs that like to stretch out and sleep on their belly or back - plenty of room. I wish that Big Barker would make a multi sided bolster bed so that I could buy one for my other lab. Hiope this review helps.
customer_reviews.author: Amon Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase so far
customer_reviews.text: This is day 1 and so far my dog LOVES this bed. She has two herniated discs so was a little timid about stepping up but has not gotten off the bed since she laid down over an hour ago. The bed comes VERY compressed and when opening it initially I was a little concerned. I let the bed "inflate" for about 12 hours and it is about 5-1/2" high now. My dog weighs about 75 lbs. and I cant see where the bed compresses so I am extremely pleased. She is on 6 weeks of bed rest so this bed will get a ton of use. I'll review again in six weeks.
customer_reviews.author: tls78754

customer_reviews.title: Best bed ever!  I wish they made adult sizes
customer_reviews.text: Love the bed!!! I have a 10 1/2 year old boxer who has severe arthritis and seizures and I wanted him to be comfortable. We received the bed earlier this week and as soon as I opened it and put the cover on he climbed right on it and slept for several hours. I was tired of buying 2 beds a year for him because the foam on them would be flat in a 4-5 months. I'm looking forward to seeing how this one holds up. It's so nice to have a warranty that will replace it if something goes wrong. Thank you for helping my senior dog enjoy his sleep.
customer_reviews.author: 00sandie

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed for my large athletic Labrador
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Big Barker bed for my 95 pound very athletic Labrador. I like the removable cover, and the amount of supportive cushion the bed gives my guy. My dog is not a chewer so I have not been able to test that aspect. These beds have been well worth the price for the comfort of my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Angie C.

customer_reviews.title: it has been four months and my dog still prefers his $40.00 Costco bed?!
customer_reviews.text: My boy is 115 pds, 14 years old and is extremely arthritic. I bought this bed thiinking he deserved to be comforable in his last years. The beds are side by side and he goes to his costco bed 9 out of 10 times. He only stays on the barker for a short time.I dont understand? I had the best of intentions? Might have to return it. it is quite exspensive
customer_reviews.author: jimmy scooter

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed - Happy Dog!!
customer_reviews.text: We have a 95 pound German Shepard - I debated about the large v. the extra large but decided on the large which is plenty big enough for Waldo. He loves the bed and does not even sink into the bad which is great. I think the dimensions are a little odd - pretty long but not very wide so if I could change one thing it would be that -
customer_reviews.author: JulieS

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Our middle aged Great Dane used to toss and turn and even groan to get comfy when napping. Now he lays down and is snoring within a minute. Does not seem to be slow getting up. I lay on it with him because the bed is comfy and so large. Is not memory foam so does not sink in and get hot. It truly is more like a mattress. Expensive compared to pet shop ones, but much better!!! Worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Traci A. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: This is my dogs second big barker bed... the first one stays in my bedroom the second one I move around so he doesn’t have to lay on the hard floor all the time. It truly supports his 115 lb body. He is around 7 yrs old and is starting to show signs of hip problems. I did research other less expensive options but this bed is second to none and I want my best friend to be as comfortable as possible!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: BETTER THAN MY MATTRESS!!
customer_reviews.text: This Dog Bed is the Cream of the Crop. The comfort level surpasses our very expensive human mattress. I have a 13 year old Dobie with Degenerative Disc Disease as well as Arthritis. She is so comfortable on this bed. You can see it all over her. My only Critique is that you make sure to consider one size bigger than what you think you need. The XL for my 73lb girl was on the cusp of correct fit. So spend the extra $30 and go up a size!
customer_reviews.author: Richard B.

customer_reviews.title: Bed even supports a 200lb man if you happen to be in the 'dog house'!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My big girl (125 pound Bullmastiff) is getting elderly like her owner, and needed more support than her old bed. She loves this and when she gets up from her nap she is better on her legs those first few steps than she was on the old bed. Great support and love the long zipper for putting it back together after it is washed, which is weekly with this breed. We also bought the liner which is very nice and does it's job. Pricey product, but you get what you pay for and it is made in the USA!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Like his first Big Barker
customer_reviews.text: Our 145 lbs. Newfoundland, Reagan, likes his Big Barker Bed so much, we got him another Big Barker for the cottage. Like his first Big Barker, Reagan took to it like a Newfoundland takes to water. There was no "breaking in period" for him. The minute I set it on the floor, he curled right up and felt right at home. Reagan has had ACL issues (strains/sprains) and since getting him a Big Barker Bed, we see definite improvement with him getting in and out of bed. Great Product! I recommend it to all my friends for their dogs, big and small.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful support
customer_reviews.text: So far, this bed is fantastic. It says to wait 24 hrs before using but my pup couldn't. She is a couch hog and wouldn't use her other beds but with the big barker bed, she doesn't want to go on the couch. I bought the large for her 53 lbs and she fits it perfectly and as you can see from the picture - no sinking! Wish I would've found this bed sooner, it is pup and owner approved!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Heinrich, Diesel, Dulley are sleeping like babies!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 2 of these, same size for a friend who has several senior GSD with arthritis. They are able to sleep and really helps the joints.I had to get another one when another dog tested it out he wasnt moving! So now you have 3 cats and a dog on one so yes they are loving the beds. These are the best and I hate and will refuse to buy anything but USA. The quality is there. Buy quality pay once lasts a lifetime. Buy low quality and buy five times. No you all have it to a science. I have never heard a complaint from a Big Barker!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Cogdal

customer_reviews.title: Miss the old beds
customer_reviews.text: My dogs have been sleeping on Orthopedic dog beds from Cabelas (or Orvis?) for years and loved them. When we got this one, no one would sleep on it. Seems too hard. Taking the cover off for washing is easy - Putting it back on is another story. The rigidity of the bed makes it really difficult to push back into the cover.
customer_reviews.author: InMotion

customer_reviews.title: Picky dog loves BIG BARKER!
customer_reviews.text: She weighs 95 pounds and she is quite picky.... if she doesn't like something, she goes to closet and sits inside ... until I remove whatever she doesn't like. SHE LOVED BIG BARKER and was trying to sit on it, even as I was trying to get it out of the box. As I write this, she is sitting on her bed .... thinking of getting another ... so she can have one in covered patio area.
customer_reviews.author: jessie barkley

customer_reviews.title: Big Barker XL dog bed
customer_reviews.text: Our 160lb English Mastiff loves his new bed. Previous one (from a different on line store) was flattened by him in no time. Ariived quickly and communication from Big Barker was great. Would have purchased the next size up but where he likes to hang out in the breakfast nook would not accommodate the bigger one. Looks great, appears to be of high quality. Well worth the price as his previous one was not much cheaper than this one. As an added bonus it's made in America and we don't have to be concerned about potential health issues due to chemical treatment or inferior foam. Highly recommend this company and their products
customer_reviews.author: WNazzy

customer_reviews.title: Dogs enjoy it
customer_reviews.text: My dogs (2 Rottie/Shepard mixes), both seem to really like the big barker dog bed. I didn’t but the water proof liner because of the price (I bought the extra large sleek addition) and of course, my 5 month puppy decided to pee on it. While it’s not water proof and some the the fluid did go through onto the foam, it could have been a lot worse. The cover was very easy to remove, wash, and put back on. I have been contemplating on rather to go ahead and buy the liner. I just wish the price wasn’t so steep.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Wiggs

customer_reviews.title: Not enough stars...
customer_reviews.text: If I could I would give the bed ten stars! My 9 year old Bouvier would probably double that. I had purchased a less expensive bed, which he decided was a throw toy, then pulled it apart. The first day Monty put a foot on the Big Barker, later that day he walked on it. The following day he slept on it, now he goes to bed while I fall asleep watching tv, and even does afternoon naps. It's beautiful, well made, and suits the furnishings in my bedroom. Every dog should have one!
customer_reviews.author: Caryl

customer_reviews.title: The bed is what they say - an amazing dog bed and helps with hip issues
customer_reviews.text: The bed is what they say - an amazing dog bed and helps with hip issues. I wish I purchased this for Blue years ago. I also wish they had a bed for outdoors because she is an inside/outside dog. I will say a word of warning if you live in a hot state the bed does get hot and the dog will probably move off the bed until it cools. I also put a cheap walmart sheet on the bed as it is easier to clean then undoing the cover every week.
customer_reviews.author: Talksalotcat

customer_reviews.title: Best dog bed, comfortable and supportive.
customer_reviews.text: My girl Holly loves her Big Barker bed! This is unlike all other beds on the market. Bed does not crush under weight of me and Holly on the bed. Best investment for Holly's joint, muscle and overall health for a restorative night's rest. Don't let the price of the bed prevent from purchasing. Big Barker offers a 10 year warranty and the quality and density of foam is superior to all beds I have seen. Cover is soft and can be easily removed for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Best Dog Bed
customer_reviews.text: You hear 'dog bed' and you think of those thin lumpy things of the past. Not this one. First the cat's curled up on it. Then the grandkids. Then the dog. Then all 3. Washable. Best money I ever spent. Coming via mail, I was afraid it would have a smell we would need to let 'off-gas'. Nope. True to size. Nothing to dislike. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Julie A. Gambino

customer_reviews.title: I think it is great, Callie is getting accustomed to it
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bed for Callie for Christmas. She is 15 and has lost most of her muscle mass in her hind quarters. I did quite a bit of research on beds for senior dogs and decided on the Big Barker since I want my Callie to be comfortable. She is sleeping on it every night now. You know it's hard to teach an old dog new tricks!! A bit pricey to purchase for a 15 year old dog but she is worth every penny!! Also American made and has a great return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Pandaqueen

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, U.S. family business
customer_reviews.text: Our 12 year old Golden Retriever welcomed this new bed with enthusiasm no matter where I placed it. He sleeps on his side, his back, or his tummy and he seems to be comfortable in any position on the Big Barker. There is no odor from the foam and it is firm yet comfortable when I sit on it. It feels like a higher quality of foam (and cover) than what I have seen in other products. I ordered the large in the color that would show dog hair the least. The cover is easy to remove and replace. The bed arrived in great condition and was well-packed. There is a 10-year warranty on the foam. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Pat W

customer_reviews.title: Big Barker/Best Beds
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the large bed and then 2 of the small beds. They arrived on time, great packaging and unfolded exactly as Big Barker explained they would. I have rescue dogs, and I replaced their old beds with Big Barker beds, and what a huge difference they have made. I noticed that they sleep straight through the night, and are not restless anymore. No more scratching and digging to get their beds just right either! Great beds, and they are made here in the USA and that is a big plus for me. Supporting our country is tremendously important to us too! Many, many thanks to Big Barker for all that they do, and their beds are incredible!
customer_reviews.author: Holly F.

customer_reviews.title: Pups love it. I want a bed this comfy for myself
customer_reviews.text: The pups loves it...I'm concerned that he loves it so much that he wants to eat it! But that's not a problem of the bed. It's well made, firm and our little 120 lb puppy feels like he deserves it. Update 10/4/19 Now we have two of these beds. Puppy adores them, they are easy to clean, still very firm and they feel like new. Best investment I have ever made for my 120 lb pupps. And that's saying a lot. Hands down, a great product. Would buy again in a heart beat.
customer_reviews.author: A Scholar

customer_reviews.title: Best dog bed purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: I had to think long and hard about purchasing a dog bed this expensive for my aging Australian Shepherd, but I am so glad I did. The minute it was out of the box, he hopped on and has loved it since. We have had it a week and I'm already noticing improved mobility in his arthritic hips and he's clearly happier and in less pain, which is worth every penny I spent. The only downside of this is the fact that it's so comfortable my five year old is trying to claim it as her space!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: The Lamborghini of dog beds!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this bed. I could easily sleep on it. This surpasses all other dog beds I have ever seen. It's light for as big as it is. My 93lbs German Shepherd doesn't sink into it like other beds. The fabric is high quality and thick. It's perfect for dogs with joint pain. My Shepherd loves it and sleeps like a rock on it. Extravagant job Big Barker! You have made a lifetime customer.
customer_reviews.author: Sbrinegar

customer_reviews.title: Love this bed!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed! You may have seen our picture in some of the advertisements. Big Barker did a story on my dog on how much it helped him recover from an accident. Our first one was purchased over 4 years ago and aside from normal wear to the cover it’s still going strong. This purchase was for an additional bed as we have been so happy with our first purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... had this bed for a couple months now and love it. I ordered the XL for our 120lb ...
customer_reviews.text: We have had this bed for a couple months now and love it. I ordered the XL for our 120lb great dane and 65lb boxer mix that always sleep together. It is the prefect size with some room to spare. I have washed and dried the cover once and it still fits perfect. Love the thickness of this bed and that it comes with a 10 year warranty. Great company too. I contacted them to see if I could get a crate pad for our Great Dane size crate and they were quick to respond and made us a wonderful custom sized crate pad that arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: B Phipps

customer_reviews.title: we unwrapped it and our great dane hopped right on and won't get off
customer_reviews.text: purchased this bed on a friend's suggestion....one slight issue was the wrong color was shipped to me, so we waited a little longer. Once the new one arrived, we unwrapped it and our great dane hopped right on and won't get off! very fast service, easy to work with, our issue was fixed quickly. the bed seems to be great quality. our concern right now is that our dane is a "nester"...she has to dig and dig and dig until she is comfortable. we have gone through TONS of beds that she shreds. we'll see how long this one lasts...i'm concerned about her ripping the cover and then into the foam. I hope this one lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: So far, my coonhound loves the bed and so do I. I can definitely feel the quality of this bed. I like the fact it doesn’t generate warmth like most memory foam does. It was expensive, but I’m sure I won’t have to replace it, And I have a very spoiled dog, but she’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Polly

customer_reviews.title: The real deal!
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with the Big Barker. Not only is it great for her to sleep on but she also uses it to safely jump on and off my bed without putting any stress on her legs. This bed is worth the price. You will not be disappointed. Quality USA product.
customer_reviews.author: kimc

customer_reviews.title: If your only hesitation is price, just get it because it is so worth it...
customer_reviews.text: My dog LOVES his Big Barker. I don't know why I ever debated over the price. I went through four "memory foam" beds from a big pet store chain and they all wound up flat as pancakes in less than a year. At $80 a pop, I spent more in cheaply made chipped memory foam beds than I did buying this once. The Big Barker barely sinks an inch with 110 pounds of German Shepherd sitting on it. Even I have stretched out on it and am a little jealous of how comfortable it is. My couch cushions aren't even this supportive. The quality is top notch. I can see why they aren't afraid to offer a ten year guarantee.
customer_reviews.author: Steven J Micherdzinski

customer_reviews.title: HIghly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough good things about this dog bed! It has been in constant use by our Newfs for several years now, you can't even tell! All those other dog beds end up tossed after a few months; this sucker is more comfortable than my bed! Great for my 11yr old arthritic Newfy; the younger ones love it too ... when they can find it unoccupied!
customer_reviews.author: Bamboo Dan

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING Pet Bed
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves his new bed! It did take him a while to start using it on a regular basis. My son or I would lay down with him to get him use to it and now he uses it all the time. The cover is soft and comfortable. I also bought the waterproof liner and it works great! If you’re looking for a dog bed, this is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Karenrene

customer_reviews.title: This bed is awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: I have an 8 year old male Rottie at 113 lbs at this time, who recently became a tripod losing his left rear leg to OSA. This bed is awesome !!! I have a couple of high quality crushed foam beds, trust me before his amputation he loved those crushed foam beds. After amputation he needed something stable and comfortable, both covered here with the Big Barker 7" HIGHLY RECOMMEND for dogs of all ages, especially older pooches. Heck I have even laid on it and I could sleep one it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: she overnights on the Big Barker and feels better. She even chased a squirrel across the yard ...
customer_reviews.text: Our older, arthritic dog has been sleeping on her new Big Barker bed for a few days now and we've noticed she gets up from the bed much easier than before and is is more active during the day. Altho she still lies under the table or on the carpet for shorter naps, she overnights on the Big Barker and feels better. She even chased a squirrel across the yard the other day, something she hadn't done in more than a year! Very pleased w our purchase; would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Portland, Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Real orthopedic dog bed.
customer_reviews.text: The bed is way more firm than the typical orthopedic dog bed. The cover is soft and so far for what I've done with it it (vacuumed) it was easy to clean. All three dogs in my household seem to like it even though it's really only for one.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley J. Nicholes

customer_reviews.title: HAPPY HAPPY LARGE DOG!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! But, more important, my huge Newfoundland loves it. The bed took its shape much more quickly than the directions led me to believe. The rare thickness ( most seem to be around 4" my research indicated) gives my dog more support and as she ages, this is important too. One of the features of this product that I appreciate is that it is made in the USA. I am impressed with everything about this bed so far. Also, delivery was quicker than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara M. Haas

customer_reviews.title: Finally,a high quality dog bed for big dogs!
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 dogs a 10 year old pit bull and a 14 year old lab mix. Both are 80+lbs and have some joint issues. Other beds purchased in the past appeared firm but once the dogs laid on them the foam flattened out. The Big Barker beds have not done this, even with a 110 lb human laying on it. Ordered the khaki color and it's better in person than on the website which was a pleasant surprise. The cover is a soft noise free fabric and appears to be sturdy. No more throwing away dog beds after 6 months of use! Overall, I am very happy with the quality of these beds and my dogs like them too!
customer_reviews.author: K
